text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Jevha tumhi imana rakhanarya striyansi vivaha karala, maga tyanna hata lavanyapurvi talaka (ghatasphota) dyala, tara tyancyavara tumaca kasalahi (adhikara) iddata (talakanantara nirdharita veleparyantaci pratibandhita mudati) ca nahi, jici tumhi ganana karavi.1 Tevha tumhi tyanna kahi na kahi dya ani bhalya ritine tyanna niropa dya
